title: Tandem Bagel Company
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Fast food, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Local bagel cafe making bagels on the premises. The ones that do not contain cheese are vegan suitable. Has house-made hummus, soymilk for coffee drinks, tofutti cream cheese upon request. The chocolate used in the mocha is vegan. Owners are accommodating of vegans requests. Free Wi-Fi.
